synopsis.text: Based in Japan, an extraordinary tale unfolds when Tomu Kusanagi, a kind-hearted individual, stumbles upon an abandoned kitten and decides to take it under his wing. The kitten, with its striking orange fur, is named Mikan - the Japanese word for tangerine. As Tomu nurtures Mikan, he soon discovers that this is no ordinary feline. Mikan possesses the remarkable ability to communicate, walk upright, and has an unusual affinity for fruit liqueur. As the story progresses, Mikan's exceptional talents, including reading and writing, become more evident, making this a heartwarming and amusing narrative that will captivate audiences.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
